Text:
Great to see some classics. 

Anyone got Majesty?

Oh man, I remember I played this for a couple weeks when it came out. It was one of the creepiest things I've ever experienced. Hard to get even past the first stages of the game...

*nightmares*

I bought this game right after it came out.  I never did get to finish (or really even start) it.

Wonder if it will run under the Basilisk II emulator...
